definition: استعداد isti‘dād readiness, willingness, preparedness; (pl. -āt) inclination, tendency, disposition, propensity; predisposition (ل for a disease), susceptibility (ل to a disease); pl. conveniences, amenities, comfort │ كان على استعداد ل to be prepared, be set for ...; to be ready, willing, inclined, in a position to ...
